Convex Analysis (Rockafellar, 1970) -- Chapter 01 -- Section 05 -- Part 8

Each epigraph sits inside the convex hull of the union of epigraphs.

lemma epigraph_subset_convexHull_union {n : Nat} { : Sort _} (f : (Fin n Real) EReal) (i : ) : epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i) convexHull ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) := by intro p hp have hsubset : ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) convexHull ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) := by simpa using (subset_convexHull ( := ) (s := i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i))) exact hsubset (Set.mem_iUnion.mpr i, hp)

If a convex function lies below each member, then the convex hull of the union of their epigraphs lies in its epigraph.

lemma convexHull_union_subset_epigraph_of_le {n : Nat} { : Sort _} {f : (Fin n Real) EReal} {h : (Fin n Real) EReal} (hh : ConvexFunctionOn (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) h) (h_le_f : i, h f i) : convexHull ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) h := by have hsubset : ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) h := by intro p hp rcases Set.mem_iUnion.1 hp with i, hi have hsubset_i : epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i) epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) h := epigraph_subset_epigraph_of_le (h := h) (g := f i) (h_le_g := h_le_f i) exact hsubset_i hi have hconv : Convex (epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) h) := convex_epigraph_of_convexFunctionOn (f := h) hh exact convexHull_min hsubset hconv

The convex-hull function family is the EReal : TypeEReal inf-section for the convex hull of the union of epigraphs.

lemma convexHullFunctionFamily_eq_inf_section_ereal {n : Nat} { : Sort _} (f : (Fin n Real) EReal) : convexHullFunctionFamily f = fun x => sInf ((fun : => ( : EReal)) '' { : | (x, ) convexHull ( i, epigraph (S := (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real))) (f i)) }) := by rfl

The convex-hull function family is the greatest convex minorant.
